targets.rawSql:
WITH _filtered_scorecards AS ( SELECT s.*, concat_ws ( ', ', (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END), (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END), (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END), (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END), (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END) ) as profile, concat_ws ( '', (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END), (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END) ) AS dataset_id2 FROM scorecards as s INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid WHERE s.program_id in (${program_id}) AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date) AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) AND s.year in ($year) AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id) AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id) AND s.deleted_at is null AND s.submitted_at is not null AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw} AND p.gender in ($gender) group by s.id ), _submitted_scorecards AS ( SELECT * FROM _filtered_scorecards sc WHERE string_to_array(sc.profile, ', ') && array[$profile] AND sc.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id) ), _conducted_scorecards AS ( SELECT * FROM _submitted_scorecards WHERE completed_at is not null ), _in_review_scorecards AS ( SELECT * FROM _submitted_scorecards WHERE completed_at is null ), _all_scorecards AS ( SELECT *, concat_ws ( '', (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END), (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END) ) AS dataset_id2 FROM scorecards s ) SELECT CONCAT( 'អង្គការអនុវត្តប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុ (', locations.name_km, ')', '
    ', ARRAY_TO_STRING(array_agg(DISTINCT CONCAT('
  1. ', local_ngos.name, '
    2. ')),''), '
', '

', 'ការអនុវត្តប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុ៖', '

    ', '
  • គ្រោងទុក: ', COUNT(*), '
    • ', '
  • កំពុងត្រួតពិនិត្យ: ', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM _in_review_scorecards WHERE province_id = locations.code), '
    • ', '
  • អនុវត្តរួចរាល់: ', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM _conducted_scorecards WHERE province_id = locations.code), '
    • ', '
', '

' ) as popup, locations.osm_latitude as latitude, locations.osm_longitude as longitude, CONCAT_WS('/', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM _conducted_scorecards WHERE province_id = locations.code), COUNT(*)) as tooltip FROM _all_scorecards as s INNER JOIN locations ON s.province_id = locations.code INNER JOIN local_ngos ON s.local_ngo_id = local_ngos.id WHERE s.program_id in (${program_id}) AND $__timeFilter(s.created_at) AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) AND s.year in ($year) AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id) AND s.province_id in ($province_id) AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id) AND s.deleted_at is null AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id) GROUP BY locations.name_km, locations.code, locations.latitude, locations.longitude;

panels.title: ផែនទីអនុវត្តប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុឌីជីថល

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  created_at AS "time",
  latitude
FROM locations
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: សង្ខេបប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុ

panels.description: ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុសរុប (អនុវត្តរួចរាល់/កំពុងត្រួតពិនិត្យ/គ្រោងទុក)

targets.rawSql:
WITH _scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards as s
  INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid
  WHERE 
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND p.gender in ($gender)
  GROUP BY s.id
),
total_conducted AS (
  SELECT count(*) as "Total Conducted"
  from _scorecards as sc
  where 
    string_to_array(sc.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND sc.completed_at is not null
    AND sc.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
),
formated_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  from scorecards s
),
total_planned AS (
  SELECT
    count(*) as "Total Planned"
  FROM formated_scorecards AS s
  WHERE
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.created_at)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
),
total_in_review AS (
  SELECT count(*) as "Total In Review"
  from _scorecards as sc
  where 
    string_to_array(sc.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND sc.submitted_at is not null
    AND sc.completed_at is null
    AND sc.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
)

SELECT 
  concat_ws (
    ' / ',
    (select * from total_conducted),
    (select * from total_in_review),
    (select * from total_planned)  
  )

panels.title: ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុសរុប (អនុវត្តរួចរាល់/កំពុងត្រួតពិនិត្យ/គ្រោងទុក)

panels.description:
ចំនួនប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលបានបញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យក្រោយថ្ងៃអនុវត្តជាក់ស្តែង
Fomular: (Entry date - Conducted date >= 1 Day)
ឧទាហរណ៍៖ ថ្ងៃអនុវត្តប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុជាក់ស្តែង 01-មករា-2022 តែ ថ្ងៃបញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យ 03-មករា-2022។

targets.rawSql:
WITH _scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2,
    EXTRACT(epoch FROM (s.finished_date - s.conducted_date))/86400 as conducted_period
  FROM scorecards as s
  INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid
  WHERE 
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND p.gender in ($gender)
  GROUP BY s.id
),
total_late_insert AS (
  SELECT count(*) as "Total Conducted"
  from _scorecards as sc
  where 
    string_to_array(sc.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND sc.completed_at is not null
    AND conducted_period > 0
    AND sc.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
)

SELECT 
  concat_ws (
    ' / ',
    (select * from total_late_insert)
  )

panels.title: ចំនួនប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលបានបញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យក្រោយថ្ងៃអនុវត្តជាក់ស្តែង

panels.description: រយៈពេលអនុវត្តប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុ (កាលបរិច្ឆេទចាប់ផ្ដើមដល់អនុវត្តរួចរាល់)

targets.rawSql:
WITH _scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    EXTRACT(epoch FROM (s.completed_at - s.conducted_date))/86400 as implemented_time,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards as s
  INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid
  WHERE 
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND s.completed_at is not null
    AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND p.gender in ($gender)
  group by s.id
),
filtered_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
  (
    CASE WHEN implemented_time <= (ceil(implemented_time) - 0.5) THEN ceil(implemented_time) - 0.5
         ELSE ceil(implemented_time)
    END
  ) as duration
  FROM _scorecards s
  WHERE 
    string_to_array(s.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
)

SELECT
  min(duration)::integer AS "អប្បបរមា (ថ្ងៃ)",
  avg(duration)::integer AS "មធ្យម (ថ្ងៃ)",
  max(duration)::integer AS "អតិបរមា (ថ្ងៃ)"
FROM filtered_scorecards;

panels.title: រយៈពេលអនុវត្តប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុ (កាលបរិច្ឆេទចាប់ផ្ដើមដល់អនុវត្តរួចរាល់)

panels.description:
LNGOs: រាប់តាម Planned Scorecard
CAFs: រាប់តាម LNGO
អ្នកចូលរួម: រាប់តាម Completed Scorecard

targets.rawSql:
WITH _scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards as s
  INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid
  WHERE 
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND s.completed_at is not null
    AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND p.gender in ($gender)
  GROUP BY s.id
),
_conducted_scorecards AS (
  SELECT s.* 
  FROM _scorecards s 
  WHERE s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
),
_formated_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards s
),
_planned_scorecards AS (
  SELECT
    s.*
  FROM _formated_scorecards AS s
  WHERE
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.created_at)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
),
_total_lngo AS (
  SELECT count(DISTINCT local_ngo_id) 
  FROM _planned_scorecards
),
_total_caf AS (
  SELECT count(*) from cafs
  WHERE local_ngo_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT(local_ngo_id) FROM _planned_scorecards )
),
_total_participant AS (
  SELECT count(*) from participants
  WHERE scorecard_uuid::integer IN ( SELECT id FROM _conducted_scorecards )
),
_avg_participant AS (
  SELECT (SELECT * from _total_participant) / (select count(*) from _conducted_scorecards)
)

SELECT 
  concat_ws (
    ' / ',
    (select * from _total_lngo),
    (select * from _total_caf),
    (select * from _total_participant),
    (select * from _avg_participant)
  );

panels.title: ចំនួន (LNGOs សរុប / CAFs សរុប / អ្នកចូលរួមសរុប / អ្នកចូលរួមជាមធ្យម)

panels.description:
Indicator ស្នើឡើង សរុប: រាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់
Indicator អាទិភាព សរុប: រាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់

targets.rawSql:
WITH pa AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN p.disability = true THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.minority = true THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.youth = true THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.poor_card = true THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (p.disability = false AND p.minority = false AND p.youth = false AND p.poor_card = false) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile
  FROM participants AS p
),
raised AS (
  SELECT
    pa.*,
    raised_indicators.id,
    raised_indicators.indicator_uuid,
    raised_indicators.selected,
    indicators.type
  FROM pa
  INNER JOIN raised_indicators ON pa.uuid = raised_indicators.participant_uuid
  INNER JOIN indicators ON raised_indicators.indicator_uuid = indicators.uuid
  WHERE
    string_to_array(pa.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND pa.gender in ($gender)
    AND pa.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
),
_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards as s
  INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid
  WHERE 
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND s.completed_at is not null
    AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND p.gender in ($gender)
  GROUP BY s.id
),
completed_scorecards AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM _scorecards as sc
  WHERE 
    string_to_array(sc.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND sc.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)

),
_total_raised AS (
  SELECT count(DISTINCT (raised.indicator_uuid, raised.scorecard_uuid))
  FROM raised
  INNER JOIN completed_scorecards ON 
    raised.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = completed_scorecards.id
),
_total_raised_selected AS (
  SELECT count(DISTINCT (raised.indicator_uuid, raised.scorecard_uuid))
  FROM raised
  INNER JOIN completed_scorecards ON 
    raised.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = completed_scorecards.id
  WHERE
    raised.selected = true
)

SELECT 
  concat_ws (
    ' / ',
    (select * from _total_raised),
    (select * from _total_raised_selected)
  );

panels.title: ចំនួនសរុប Indicator (ស្នើឡើង / អាទិភាព)

panels.description:
Indicator ស្នើឡើង ជាមធ្យម: ក្នុង 1 ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់
Indicator ស្នើឡើងថ្មី ជាមធ្យម: ក្នុង 1 ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់
Indicator អាទិភាព ជាមធ្យម: ក្នុង 1 ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់

targets.rawSql:
WITH pa AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN p.disability = true THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.minority = true THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.youth = true THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.poor_card = true THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (p.disability = false AND p.minority = false AND p.youth = false AND p.poor_card = false) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile
  FROM participants AS p
),
raised AS (
  SELECT
    pa.*,
    raised_indicators.id,
    raised_indicators.indicator_uuid,
    raised_indicators.selected,
    indicators.type
  FROM pa
  INNER JOIN raised_indicators ON pa.uuid = raised_indicators.participant_uuid
  INNER JOIN indicators ON raised_indicators.indicator_uuid = indicators.uuid
  WHERE
    string_to_array(pa.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND pa.gender in ($gender)
    AND pa.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
),
_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards as s
  INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid
  WHERE 
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND s.completed_at is not null
    AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND p.gender in ($gender)
  GROUP BY s.id
),
completed_scorecards AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM _scorecards as sc
  WHERE 
    string_to_array(sc.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND sc.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
),
_total_raised AS (
  SELECT count(DISTINCT (raised.indicator_uuid, raised.scorecard_uuid))
  FROM raised
  INNER JOIN completed_scorecards ON 
    raised.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = completed_scorecards.id
),
_total_raised_selected AS (
  SELECT count(DISTINCT (raised.indicator_uuid, raised.scorecard_uuid))
  FROM raised
  INNER JOIN completed_scorecards ON 
    raised.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = completed_scorecards.id
  WHERE
    raised.selected = true
),
_total_raised_custom AS (
  SELECT count(DISTINCT raised.indicator_uuid)
  FROM raised
  INNER JOIN completed_scorecards ON 
    raised.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = completed_scorecards.id
  WHERE
    raised.type = 'Indicators::CustomIndicator'
),
_total_scorecard AS (
  SELECT count(*)
  FROM completed_scorecards
),

_avg_raised AS (
  SELECT (select * from _total_raised) / (select * from _total_scorecard)
),
_avg_raised_selected AS (
  SELECT (select * from _total_raised_selected) / (select * from _total_scorecard)
),
_avg_raised_custom AS (
  SELECT (select * from _total_raised_custom) / (select * from _total_scorecard)
)

SELECT 
  concat_ws (
    ' / ',
    (select * from _avg_raised),
    (select * from _avg_raised_custom),
    (select * from _avg_raised_selected)
  );

panels.title: ចំនួនមធ្យម Indicator (ស្នើឡើង / ស្នើឡើងថ្មី / អាទិភាព)

panels.description: ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុសរុប (អនុវត្តរួចរាល់ vs គ្រោងទុក) តាមប្រភេទសេវា

matcher.options: ចំនួនអនុវត្តរួចរាល់
ចំនួនគ្រោងទុក

targets.rawSql:
WITH conducted_scorecards AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        s.*,
        concat_ws (
          ', ',
          (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
          (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
          (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
          (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
          (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
        ) as profile,
        concat_ws (
          '',
          (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
          (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
        ) AS dataset_id2
      FROM scorecards as s
      INNER JOIN participants on s.id::varchar(20) = participants.scorecard_uuid
      WHERE 
        s.program_id in (${program_id})
        AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
        AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type)
        AND s.year in ($year)
        AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
        AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
        AND s.deleted_at is null
        AND s.completed_at is not null
        AND participants.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
        AND participants.gender in ($gender)
      group by s.id
    ) as sc
  WHERE 
    string_to_array(sc.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND sc.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
),
_formated_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2    
  FROM scorecards s
),
planned_scorecards AS (
  SELECT
    *
  FROM _formated_scorecards AS s
  WHERE
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.created_at)
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id) 
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
)

SELECT
  tm.name,
  sum(tm.total_planned) as "ចំនួនគ្រោងទុក",
  sum(tm.total_conducted) as "ចំនួនអនុវត្តរួចរាល់"
FROM (
  SELECT
    facilities.name_km as name,
    ( SELECT count(*) FROM planned_scorecards AS cs WHERE cs.facility_id = facilities.id ) as "total_planned",
    ( SELECT count(*) FROM conducted_scorecards AS cs WHERE cs.facility_id = facilities.id ) as "total_conducted"
  FROM planned_scorecards
  INNER JOIN facilities ON planned_scorecards.facility_id = facilities.id
  GROUP BY facilities.name_km, facilities.id
) AS tm
GROUP BY tm.name;

panels.title: ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុសរុប (អនុវត្តរួចរាល់ vs គ្រោងទុក) តាមប្រភេទសេវា

panels.description: ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលអនុវត្តរួចរាល់ (វាយតម្លៃខ្លួនឯង vs ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុសហគមន៍) តាមប្រភេទសេវា

matcher.options: ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុសហគមន៍
វាយតម្លៃខ្លួនឯង

targets.rawSql:
WITH _scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards as s
  INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid
  WHERE 
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND s.completed_at is not null
    AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND p.gender in ($gender)
  GROUP BY s.id
)

SELECT 
  facilities.name_km as name, 
  COUNT(CASE WHEN t.scorecard_type = 1 THEN 1 END) as "វាយតម្លៃខ្លួនឯង",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN t.scorecard_type = 2 THEN 2 END) as "ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុសហគមន៍"
FROM (
  SELECT * 
  FROM _scorecards as sc
  WHERE 
    string_to_array(sc.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND sc.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
) as t
INNER JOIN facilities ON t.facility_id = facilities.id
GROUP BY facilities.name_km;

panels.title: ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលអនុវត្តរួចរាល់ (វាយតម្លៃខ្លួនឯង vs ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុសហគមន៍) តាមប្រភេទសេវា

panels.description: របាយការណ៍នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុទាំងឡាយណាដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់នៅសហគមន៍

matcher.options: មណ្ឌលសុខភាព
រដ្ឋបាលឃុំសង្កាត់
ការិយាល័យច្រកចេញចូលតែមួយ
សេវារដ្ឋបាលស្រុក

targets.rawSql:
WITH _scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards as s
  INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid
  WHERE 
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND s.completed_at is not null
    AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND p.gender in ($gender)
  GROUP BY s.id
)

SELECT 
  facilities.name_km as name, 
  COUNT(*)
FROM (
  SELECT * 
  FROM _scorecards s
  WHERE 
    string_to_array(s.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
) as t
INNER JOIN facilities ON t.facility_id = facilities.id
GROUP BY facilities.name_km;

panels.title: ប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុដែលអនុវត្តរួចរាល់តាមប្រភេទសេវា

panels.description: របាយការណ៍នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុទាំងឡាយណាដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់នៅសហគមន៍ដោយ អ្នកសម្របសម្រួលគណនេយ្យភាពសហគមន៍(CAF)

targets.rawSql:
WITH _scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_disability > 0 THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_ethnic_minority > 0 THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_youth > 0 THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.number_of_id_poor > 0 THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (s.number_of_disability = 0 AND s.number_of_ethnic_minority = 0 AND s.number_of_youth = 0 AND s.number_of_id_poor = 0) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards as s
  INNER JOIN participants as p on s.id::varchar(20) = p.scorecard_uuid
  WHERE 
    s.program_id in (${program_id})
    AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
    AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
    AND s.year in ($year) 
    AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
    AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
    AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
    AND s.deleted_at is null
    AND p.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND p.gender in ($gender)
  GROUP BY s.id
)

SELECT 
  (
    CASE 
      WHEN sc.device_type = 'mobile' THEN 'ទូរស័ព្ទ'
      ELSE 'ថេប្លេត'
    END
  ) as "ប្រភេទឧបករណ៍",
  count(*)
FROM _scorecards as sc
WHERE 
  string_to_array(sc.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
  AND sc.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
GROUP BY sc.device_type;

panels.title: ការអនុវត្តប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុបែងចែកតាមប្រភេទឧបករណ៍

panels.description: របាយការណ៍នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុទាំងឡាយណាដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់នៅសហគមន៍

targets.rawSql:
WITH pa AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    (
      CASE 
        WHEN gender = 'male' THEN 'ប្រុស'
        WHEN gender = 'female' THEN 'ស្រី'
        ELSE 'ផ្សេងៗ'
      END
    ) as gender_km,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN p.disability = true THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.minority = true THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.youth = true THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.poor_card = true THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (p.disability = false AND p.minority = false AND p.youth = false AND p.poor_card = false) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile
  FROM participants AS p
),
_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards s
)

SELECT
  gender_km,
  count(*)
FROM pa
INNER JOIN _scorecards s ON 
  pa.scorecard_uuid = s.id::varchar(255)
WHERE 
  s.program_id in (${program_id})
  AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
  AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
  AND s.year in ($year)
  AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type)
  AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
  AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
  AND s.deleted_at is null
  AND s.completed_at is not null
  AND pa.gender in ($gender)
  AND pa.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
  AND string_to_array(pa.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
  AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
GROUP BY gender_km
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: អ្នកចូលរួមបែងចែកតាមភេទ

panels.description: របាយការណ៍នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុទាំងឡាយណាដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់នៅសហគមន៍

targets.rawSql:
WITH pa AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    (
      CASE 
        WHEN age > 45 THEN 'អាយុ > 45'
        WHEN age > 30 THEN 'អាយុ 31 - 45'
        WHEN age > 14 THEN 'អាយុ 15 - 30'
        ELSE 'អាយុ< 15'
      END
    ) as age_range,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN p.disability = true THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.minority = true THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.youth = true THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.poor_card = true THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (p.disability = false AND p.minority = false AND p.youth = false AND p.poor_card = false) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile
  FROM participants AS p
),
_scorecards AS (
  SELECT
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards s
)

SELECT
  age_range,
  count(*)
FROM pa
INNER JOIN _scorecards s ON 
  pa.scorecard_uuid = s.id::varchar(255)
WHERE 
  s.program_id in (${program_id})
  AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
  AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
  AND s.year in ($year)
  AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type)
  AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
  AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
  AND s.deleted_at is null
  AND s.completed_at is not null
  AND pa.gender in ($gender)
  AND pa.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
  AND string_to_array(pa.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
  AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
GROUP BY age_range
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: អ្នកចូលរួមបែងចែកតាមអាយុ

panels.description: របាយការណ៍នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុទាំងឡាយណាដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់នៅសហគមន៍

matcher.options: ប័ណ្ណក្រីក្រ

targets.rawSql:
WITH par AS (
  (
    SELECT participants.*, 'ID Poor' as profile, 'ប័ណ្ណក្រីក្រ' as profile_km
    FROM participants WHERE participants.poor_card is true
  )
  UNION ALL
  (
    SELECT participants.*, 'Disability' as profile, 'ពិការភាព' as profile_km
    FROM participants WHERE participants.disability is true
  )
  UNION ALL
  (
    SELECT participants.*, 'Minority' as profile, 'ជនជាតិដើម' as profile_km
    FROM participants WHERE participants.minority is true
  )
  UNION ALL
  (
    SELECT participants.*, 'Youth' as profile, 'យុវជន' as profile_km
    FROM participants WHERE participants.youth is true
  )
),
_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards s
)

SELECT 
  par.profile_km, count(*)
FROM par
INNER JOIN _scorecards s ON par.scorecard_uuid = s.id::varchar(255)
WHERE 
  s.program_id in (${program_id})
  AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
  AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
  AND s.year in ($year)
  AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type)
  AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
  AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
  AND s.deleted_at is null
  AND s.completed_at is not null
  AND par.gender in ($gender)
  AND par.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
  AND par.profile in ($profile)
  AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
GROUP BY par.profile_km

panels.title: អ្នកចូលរួមបែងចែកតាមលក្ខណៈសម្បតិ្ត

panels.description: របាយការណ៍នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុទាំងឡាយណាដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់នៅសហគមន៍

matcher.options: ចំនួនស្នើឡើង

targets.rawSql:
WITH pa AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN p.disability = true THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.minority = true THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.youth = true THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.poor_card = true THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (p.disability = false AND p.minority = false AND p.youth = false AND p.poor_card = false) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile
  FROM participants AS p
),
raised AS (
  SELECT
    pa.*,
    raised_indicators.id,
    raised_indicators.indicator_uuid
  FROM pa
  INNER JOIN raised_indicators ON pa.uuid = raised_indicators.participant_uuid
  WHERE
    string_to_array(pa.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND pa.gender in ($gender)
    AND pa.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
),
_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards s
)

SELECT
  indicators.name,
  count(*) as "ចំនួនស្នើឡើង"
FROM raised
INNER JOIN _scorecards s ON
  raised.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = s.id
INNER JOIN indicators ON
  raised.indicator_uuid = indicators.uuid
WHERE 
  s.program_id in (${program_id})
  AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
  AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type)
  AND s.year in ($year)
  AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
  AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
  AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
  AND s.deleted_at is null
  AND s.completed_at is not null
  AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
GROUP BY indicators.name
ORDER BY "ចំនួនស្នើឡើង" DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: លក្ខណៈវិនិច្ឆ័យដែលស្នើឡើងច្រើនជាងគេទាំង៥

panels.description: របាយការណ៍នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុទាំងឡាយណាដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់នៅសហគមន៍

matcher.options: ចំនួនបានអនុវត្ត

targets.rawSql:
WITH pa AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN p.disability = true THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.minority = true THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.youth = true THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.poor_card = true THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (p.disability = false AND p.minority = false AND p.youth = false AND p.poor_card = false) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile
  FROM participants AS p
),
raised AS (
  SELECT
    pa.*,
    raised_indicators.id,
    raised_indicators.indicator_uuid
  FROM pa
  INNER JOIN raised_indicators ON pa.uuid = raised_indicators.participant_uuid
  WHERE
    string_to_array(pa.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND pa.gender in ($gender)
    AND pa.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND raised_indicators.selected is true
),
_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards s
)

SELECT
  indicators.name,
  count(distinct(raised.scorecard_uuid)) as "ចំនួនបានអនុវត្ត"
FROM raised
INNER JOIN _scorecards s ON
  raised.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = s.id
INNER JOIN indicators ON
  raised.indicator_uuid = indicators.uuid
WHERE 
  s.program_id in ($program_id)
  AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)
  AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type)
  AND s.year in ($year)
  AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
  AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
  AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
  AND s.deleted_at is null
  AND s.completed_at is not null
  AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
GROUP BY indicators.name
ORDER BY "ចំនួនបានអនុវត្ត" DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: លក្ខណៈវិនិច្ឆ័យអាទិភាព(ដែលបានអនុវត្ត)ច្រើនជាងគេទាំង៥

panels.description: របាយការណ៍នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុទាំងឡាយណាដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់នៅសហគមន៍

matcher.options: ចំនួនបោះឆ្នោត

targets.rawSql:
WITH pa AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN p.disability = true THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.minority = true THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.youth = true THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.poor_card = true THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (p.disability = false AND p.minority = false AND p.youth = false AND p.poor_card = false) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile
  FROM participants AS p
),
rate AS (
  SELECT
    pa.*,
    ratings.score,
    ratings.voting_indicator_uuid,
    ratings.participant_uuid
  FROM pa
  INNER JOIN ratings ON pa.uuid = ratings.participant_uuid
  WHERE
    string_to_array(pa.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND pa.gender in ($gender)
    AND pa.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND ratings.score > 3
),
_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards s
)

SELECT
  indicators.name,
  count(*) as "ចំនួនបោះឆ្នោត"
FROM rate
INNER JOIN voting_indicators
  ON voting_indicators.uuid = rate.voting_indicator_uuid
INNER JOIN indicators
  ON voting_indicators.indicator_uuid = indicators.uuid
INNER JOIN _scorecards s ON
  voting_indicators.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = s.id
WHERE
  s.program_id in (${program_id})
  AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)  
  AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
  AND s.year in ($year) 
  AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
  AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
  AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
  AND s.deleted_at is null
  AND s.completed_at is not null
  AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
GROUP BY indicators.name
ORDER BY "ចំនួនបោះឆ្នោត" DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: លក្ខណៈវិនិច្ឆ័យអាទិភាពទាំង៥ (😁 ពេញចិត្ត)

WITH pa AS (

      (CASE WHEN p.disability = true THEN 'Disability' END),

_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,

      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),

SELECT
  indicators.name,
  count(*) as "ចំនួនបោះឆ្នោត"

INNER JOIN voting_indicators
  ON voting_indicators.uuid = rate.voting_indicator_uuid

INNER JOIN _scorecards s ON
  voting_indicators.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = s.id
WHERE
  s.program_id in (${program_id})
  AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)  
  AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
  AND s.year in ($year) 
  AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
  AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
  AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
  AND s.deleted_at is null

panels.title: លក្ខណៈវិនិច្ឆ័យអាទិភាពទាំង៥ (🙂 ទទួលយកបាន)

panels.description: របាយការណ៍នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលតែប័ណ្ណដាក់ពិន្ទុទាំងឡាយណាដែលបានអនុវត្តរួចរាល់នៅសហគមន៍

matcher.options: ចំនួនបោះឆ្នោត

targets.rawSql:
WITH pa AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    concat_ws (
      ', ',
      (CASE WHEN p.disability = true THEN 'Disability' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.minority = true THEN 'Minority' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.youth = true THEN 'Youth' END),
      (CASE WHEN p.poor_card = true THEN 'ID Poor' END),
      (CASE WHEN (p.disability = false AND p.minority = false AND p.youth = false AND p.poor_card = false) THEN 'N/A' END)
    ) as profile
  FROM participants AS p
),
rate AS (
  SELECT
    pa.*,
    ratings.score,
    ratings.voting_indicator_uuid,
    ratings.participant_uuid
  FROM pa
  INNER JOIN ratings ON pa.uuid = ratings.participant_uuid
  WHERE
    string_to_array(pa.profile, ', ') && array[$profile]
    AND pa.gender in ($gender)
    AND pa.age BETWEEN ${age:raw}
    AND ratings.score < 3
),
_scorecards AS (
  SELECT 
    s.*,
    concat_ws (
      '',
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is null THEN '' END),
      (CASE WHEN s.dataset_id is not null THEN s.dataset_id END)
    ) AS dataset_id2
  FROM scorecards s
)

SELECT
  indicators.name,
  count(*) as "ចំនួនបោះឆ្នោត"
FROM rate
INNER JOIN voting_indicators
  ON voting_indicators.uuid = rate.voting_indicator_uuid
INNER JOIN indicators
  ON voting_indicators.indicator_uuid = indicators.uuid
INNER JOIN _scorecards s ON
  voting_indicators.scorecard_uuid::INTEGER = s.id
WHERE
  s.program_id in (${program_id})
  AND $__timeFilter(s.conducted_date)  
  AND s.scorecard_type in ($scorecard_type) 
  AND s.year in ($year) 
  AND s.facility_id in ($facility_id)
  AND s.province_id in ($province_id)
  AND s.local_ngo_id in ($local_ngo_id)
  AND s.deleted_at is null
  AND s.completed_at is not null
  AND s.dataset_id2 in ($dataset_id)
GROUP BY indicators.name
ORDER BY "ចំនួនបោះឆ្នោត" DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: លក្ខណៈវិនិច្ឆ័យអាទិភាពទាំង៥ (😡 មិនពេញចិត្ត)

options.content:
គាំទ្រមូលនិធិដោយ/Funded by
អនុវត្តដោយ/Implemented by
អំពីយើង/About Us

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  created_at AS "time",
  latitude
FROM locations
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
ORDER BY 1

list.definition: select name_km AS __text, code AS __value  from locations where parent_id is null;
list.label: Province
list.name: province_id
list.query: select name_km AS __text, code AS __value  from locations where parent_id is null;

list.definition: select distinct(year) from scorecards where program_id in (${program_id})
list.label: Year
list.name: year
list.query: select distinct(year) from scorecards where program_id in (${program_id})

list.definition: select name_en from facilities where parent_id is not null AND program_id in (${program_id});
list.label: Sector
list.name: facility_name
list.query: select name_en from facilities where parent_id is not null AND program_id in (${program_id});

list.definition: select id AS __value  from facilities where parent_id is not null AND name_en in ($facility_name) AND program_id in (${program_id});
list.label: Sector
list.name: facility_id
list.query: select id AS __value  from facilities where parent_id is not null AND name_en in ($facility_name) AND program_id in (${program_id});

list.definition: select code AS __value, name_km AS __text from program_scorecard_types where program_id in (${program_id});
list.label: Scorecard Type
list.name: scorecard_type
list.query: select code AS __value, name_km AS __text from program_scorecard_types where program_id in (${program_id});

list.label: Gender
list.name: gender
list.query: Male : male, Female : female, Other : other

list.definition: select name AS __text, id AS __value from programs order by id;
list.label: Program
list.name: program_id
list.query: select name AS __text, id AS __value from programs order by id;

list.definition: select name from local_ngos where deleted_at is null AND program_id in (${program_id});
list.label: Local NGO
list.name: local_ngo_name
list.query: select name from local_ngos where deleted_at is null AND program_id in (${program_id});

list.definition: (select id AS __value  from local_ngos where name in ($local_ngo_name) AND deleted_at is null AND program_id in (${program_id})) union all (select -1);
list.label: Local NGO
list.name: local_ngo_id
list.query: (select id AS __value  from local_ngos where name in ($local_ngo_name) AND deleted_at is null AND program_id in (${program_id})) union all (select -1);

list.definition: (SELECT d.name_km FROM datasets d INNER JOIN facilities f ON d.category_id::text = f.category_id::text WHERE f.id IN ($facility_id) AND f.program_id IN (${program_id}) GROUP BY d.name_km) union (SELECT 'មិនកំណត់')
list.label: Institution
list.name: dataset_name
list.query: (SELECT d.name_km FROM datasets d INNER JOIN facilities f ON d.category_id::text = f.category_id::text WHERE f.id IN ($facility_id) AND f.program_id IN (${program_id}) GROUP BY d.name_km) union (SELECT 'មិនកំណត់')

list.definition: (SELECT d.id::text FROM datasets d INNER JOIN facilities f ON d.category_id::text = f.category_id::text WHERE f.id IN ($facility_id) AND d.name_km IN ($dataset_name) AND f.program_id IN (${program_id}) GROUP BY d.id::text) union all (SELECT '')
list.name: dataset_id
list.query: (SELECT d.id::text FROM datasets d INNER JOIN facilities f ON d.category_id::text = f.category_id::text WHERE f.id IN ($facility_id) AND d.name_km IN ($dataset_name) AND f.program_id IN (${program_id}) GROUP BY d.id::text) union all (SELECT '')
